summary: Completed backend and frontend testing for ECHO SHOP Phase 1 (Vendas/Contratos/OS) and Phase 2 (Equipamentos). All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend login, OS listing, OS details modal, and Equipamentos pages working correctly. Fixed one bug in Equipamentos.js component.

ui_bugs.issue: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'toFixed') - values custo_aquisicao, valor_venda, valor_locacao_mensal could be undefined

critical_code_review_comments: Equipamentos.js: Fixed null/undefined handling for numeric values with toFixed() - always use (value || 0).toFixed(2) pattern
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing 3 OS and 3 equipamentos
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 (Vendas/Contratos/OS) and Phase 2 (Equipamentos) are fully functional. Backend APIs all working. Frontend pages tested: Login, Dashboard, Ordens de Serviço (with details modal), Equipamentos (under Estoque), EquipamentosServico (Phase 2 equipment management). The empresa_id for testing is 884bd1b2-ceb7-4ca6-8f5b-f847333eca3e. Rate limiting is active on login endpoint (10/minute) - use cached token approach in tests.

frontend_pages: Ordens de Serviço - list with 3 OS cards ✅
OS Details Modal - client info, checklist, contract status ✅
EquipamentosServico (Phase 2) - dashboard with metrics and table ✅
